Thing.name: description
Thing.description: A short description of the item.

Thing.name: image
Thing.description: URL of an image of the item.

CreativeWork.name: about
CreativeWork.description: The subject matter of the content.

CreativeWork.name: aggregateRating
CreativeWork.description: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.

CreativeWork.name: audio
CreativeWork.description: An embedded audio object.

CreativeWork.name: author
CreativeWork.description: The author of this content. Please note that author is special in that HTML 5 provides a special mechanism for indicating authorship via the rel tag. That is equivalent to this and may be used interchangabely.

CreativeWork.name: awards
CreativeWork.description: Awards won by this person or for this creative work.

CreativeWork.name: contentLocation
CreativeWork.description: The location of the content.

CreativeWork.name: contentRating
CreativeWork.description: Official rating of a piece of content—for example,'MPAA PG-13'.

CreativeWork.name: datePublished
CreativeWork.description: Date of first broadcast/publication.

CreativeWork.name: editor
CreativeWork.description: Editor for this content.

CreativeWork.name: encodings
CreativeWork.description: The media objects that encode this creative work

CreativeWork.name: genre
CreativeWork.description: Genre of the creative work

CreativeWork.name: headline
CreativeWork.description: Headline of the article

CreativeWork.name: inLanguage
CreativeWork.description: The language of the content. please use one of the language codes from the IETF BCP 47 standard.

CreativeWork.name: interactionCount
CreativeWork.description: A count of a specific user interactions with this item—for example, 20 UserLikes, 5 UserComments, or 300 UserDownloads. The user interaction type should be one of the sub types of UserInteraction.

CreativeWork.name: isFamilyFriendly
CreativeWork.description: Indicates whether this content is family friendly.

CreativeWork.name: keywords
CreativeWork.description: The keywords/tags used to describe this content.

CreativeWork.name: offers
CreativeWork.description: An offer to sell this item—for example, an offer to sell a product, the DVD of a movie, or tickets to an event.

CreativeWork.name: publisher
CreativeWork.description: The publisher of the creative work.

CreativeWork.name: reviews
CreativeWork.description: Review of the item.

CreativeWork.name: video
CreativeWork.description: An embedded video object.

MusicPlaylist.name: numTracks
MusicPlaylist.description: The number of tracks in this album or playlist.

MusicPlaylist.name: tracks
MusicPlaylist.description: A music recording (track)—usually a single song.

properties.name: byArtist
properties.description: The artist that performed this album or recording.
